attributes.action: Please make Wootton Bassett ROYAL WOOTTON BASSETT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MAKE IT ROYAL WOOTTON BASSETT, Given that the people of Wootten Bassett have regulary performed the duties of Royalty and our so called politicians by welcoming home the bodies of our servicemen and women with dignity and respect and have represented the nations sympathy with modesty, this country should repay their loyalty to the crown and its armed forces by granting Royal Patronage upon the town and rename it Royal Wootten Bassett.
If not for the people for the soliders who have passed through there to there final resting place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Please make Wootton Bassett ROYAL WOOTTON BASSETT."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22505


Prime Minister's Office
